job.title: Principal Site Reliability Engineer - 100% Remote
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description:
Headquartered in Seattle, WA, we are a venture-backed startup that has created a new category of voice tech infrastructure. Our conversational intelligence API unlocks proprietary machine learning algorithms that integrate with a brand's communication systems to identify & highlight priorities, actions, and insights born from conversational workforce collaboration in real-time. Backed by Amazon, Techstars, and the same folks behind SendGrid, Microsoft Speech, & FlowRoute, Bixby. In addition, we count Twilio, Google Cloud & Nvidia as our technical partners. We operate at the forefront of ML/NLP!!
We are actively seeking a Principal SRE to empower our entire R&D organization. Alongside a diverse distributed Infrastructure group, you'll participate in building the next iteration of our service platform; focusing on the reliability, operability, observability, flexibility, and cost-effectiveness of our production infrastructure.
What You Will Be Doing
Build, maintain, automate, and introspect production systems
Mentor teams to reliably and cost-effectively operate and maintain services
Build the next version of our platform (focused on deployment and observability) to support teams in deploying hundreds of services across a multi-region cloud environment
Take proactive steps to improve our availability, reliability, and efficiency
Participate in driving us as a market leader in the conversation intelligence ecosystem
Participate in an on-call rotation to support our business-critical infrastructure
What You Need for this Position
5+ years of production-level experience
Large-scale, distributed systems
Cloud Computing (we use GCP)
Go, Python, NodeJS, Bash, or similar
Understanding of Linux systems administration and programming
(+) Kubernetes, EKS, ECS
(+) Kafka or related
(+) Linux kernel internals and networking protocols
(+) Datadog or NewRelic
So if you are an SRE with experience, please apply today and email caroline.veillon@Optello.com!
